text:
1. Wet the hair.
2. Divide the hair into sections.
3. Hold the blow dryer in one hand.
4. Use a brush or comb in the other hand.
5. Start with one section of hair.
6. Place the brush or comb at the roots of the hair.
7. Simultaneously move the brush or comb downwards while blowing hot air from the blow dryer.
8. Repeat the brushing and blowing process for each section of hair.
9. Continue until all sections of hair are dry and styled.
